about_the_game:
GAME INFORMATION

Master the art of collecting achievements in this new game, designed to satisfy your appetite for challenges and rewards.

COLLECT ACHIEVEMENTS
Immerse yourself in a world where every step, every decision, and every action contributes to your progress in collecting achievements. From simple tasks for beginners to complex challenges for veterans, this game offers a wide array of achievements waiting to be conquered.

GLADIATORS
Choose from fifteen different gladiators, each with a unique appearance reflecting their personality and origin. Although all gladiators behave the same in combat, the variety in their visual style gives players the option to choose a character they can identify with or that expresses their aesthetic preferences. From imposing armored titans to agile and lightweight fighters, each gladiator brings their unique presence to the battlefield.

TRAPS
The arena is not just about strength and combat skills; it's also a place full of dangers and cunning. Use traps scattered throughout the arena to your advantage to surprise your opponents or turn the tide of battle in your favor.

LANGUAGES

On the home page of our game, we strive to be open about our approach to translations. All language versions in our game are machine-translated, which means we utilize automated technologies to translate texts into various languages. This method allows us to efficiently expand the reach of the game and make it accessible to players worldwide.

While we aim for the most accurate translation possible, it's important to realize that machine translation may not always capture the subtleties and nuances of the original text. There can be minor inaccuracies, but these do not alter the overall gaming experience.

We are committed to providing quality translations and believe that despite occasional imperfections, players from different linguistic regions can fully experience and enjoy our game. We value feedback from our players and are ready to further improve and update the language versions based on their suggestions.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains blood, dismemberment, death, violence, and human bones. Not suitable for persons under 18

name: Arena of Trophies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Join the epic battle in an arena filled with gladiators and test your skills in a game where every move can lead to glory or downfall. Collect achievements, refine your strategies, and become a legend in the endless fight for survival and recognition!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Japanese, Polish, Ukrainian, Czech, Greek, Swedish
